inclusion.criterion: Non-lobular infiltrating carcinoma, maximum of 2 cm in diameter.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: The patient was operated on and the tumor was excised with lumpectomy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The tumor is reported with negative margins >3 mm, as per our hospital protocol.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: For invasive carcinoma, axillary lymph nodes are negative by sentinel lymph node (SLN) mapping and biopsy or by formal axillary lymph node dissection.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient is over 40 years old with life expectancy of at least 5 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky status must be at least 70.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Pre- and post-menopausal women are eligible for entry.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: The patient must be aware of the neoplastic nature of her disease and must be willing to consent after being informed of the potential benefits, side effects and risks of radiotherapy.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Institutional Review Board approval of this protocol and a consent form is required.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: No concurrent or neoadjuvant chemotherapy is allowed.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with diffuse calcifications, multifocal or multicentric disease, lymph-vascular invasion are excluded.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients cannot participate if there is extensive LCIS (Lobular carcinoma in situ) in specimen or extensive DCIS.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients are excluded if systemic disease is present or the patient has been irradiated to the ipsilateral breast or the chest wall.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant woman cannot participate in the study.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with a history of breast cancer, who has undergone lumpectomy and has negative margins. She has no concurrent or neoadjuvant chemotherapy and does not have diffuse calcifications, multifocal or multicentric disease, lymph-vascular invasion, extensive LCIS (Lobular carcinoma in situ) in specimen or extensive DCIS.
